name: Stolemates
description:
Steal the heart in the middle of the map from your friends in local multiplayer! Keep it all to yourself while you avoid the other players. Jump and dash to maneuver around the beautiful map based off  Toronto. Use all 6 power ups to help you get the edge on opponents! 

Current power ups include:
LoveBomb - the homing projectile

Catfished - the trap to catch others off guard

LoveStruck - for when you need a little boost

Sliding in the DMs - makes your opponents slide uncontrollably

Ghosted - shrinks your opponents and disables their jump/dash

HeartShield - protects you from other powers and hazards
